Description: Legs and lower torso of an adult body; remains of textile. (The Register records this object as 'Fragments of the body of Mycerinus'.)
Bibliographic references: Fletcher, Antoine and Hill 2014 / Regarding the Dead: Human Remains in the British Museum (p.105, p.107, p.111, table 1)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Col R W Howard Vyse
Additional IDs: Other BM number: EA6648 (original Big Number)
